content: "Cos'è quella casa?", chiese Pinocchio a un ragazzino vicino a lui. "Leggi il cartello e lo saprai." "Vorrei leggere, ma in qualche modo non posso oggi."
translations: eng:What is that house﹖ Pinocchio asked a little boy near him. Read the sign and you'll know. I'd like to read, but somehow
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Guybrush88 (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
